data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Cahul hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cahul, Moldova
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Cahul, Moldova a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Cahul, Moldova.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Cahul, Moldova to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Cahul, Moldova.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Cahul to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 74,688 people in the state of Cahul who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,867 believers in Cahul that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cahul, Moldova has a population of 105,400.

We estimate Cahul has 4,867 people who might know Jesus, 74,688 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,845 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
